entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm near noon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 20. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Thursday 11 May 2023
